name: Mutiny
description:
Made for Brainseden 2018 Gamejam in 48 hours, with the theme unreliable.
It's an arena fighter where you play as space pirates trying to seize control of their spaceship as a Insane A.I. attempts to create chaos.

You're armed with a laser gun and a gravity gun with emits gravity bombs which are detonated by firing a second time.

The game is optimised to play with two gamepads but its possible to play with one keyboard.

Backspace: StartGame/Return to mainmenu

Player 1

E:forward
D:back
S:left 
F:right 

A:camera left 
G:camera right

Shift,3,4:boost
W:fire laser
R:fire gravity bomb/detonate

Player 2

Up:forward
Down:back
Left:left 
Right:right 

Right Ctrl:camera left 
Num0:camera right

End:boost
Right Shift:fire laser
Num1:fire gravity bomb/detonate

Grab a friend and play.
